description:
Koichi can`t handle living in captivity any longer and tries to plan his escape. While talking to Yukako, Koichi finds out that there`s a payphone nearby, and has Reverb go find it. He tries to contact Josuke and Okuyasu, but Yukako already figured out what he was planning. Koichi loses hope. Yukako then goes to the phone to order some ingredients but then something unexpected happens...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yamagishi Yukako wa Koi o Suru: Sono 2
Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 2
山岸由花子は恋をする その2
